Bash("C:\\midjourney-studio - Copy\\venv\\Scripts\\python.exe" -c "
import google.generativeai as genai

api_key = ''AIzaSyA-HlnqENZqu6x4IuQ06gJzDa41jLFvJGc''

try:
    genai.configure\(api_key=api_key\)
    # Try listing models to see if API key is valid
    models = genai.list_models\(\)
    print\(''API KEY IS VALID''\)
    print\(''Available models:''\)
    for model in models:
        print\(f''  - {model.name}''\)
        break
except Exception as e:
    print\(f''API KEY FAILED: {str\(e\)[:200]}''\)
")

Bash("C:\\midjourney-studio - Copy\\venv\\Scripts\\python.exe" -c "
import google.generativeai as genai

api_key = ''AIzaSyA-HlnqENZqu6x4IuQ06gJzDa41jLFvJGc''

try:
    genai.configure\(api_key=api_key\)
    
    # List all available models
    models = list\(genai.list_models\(\)\)
    
    print\(''TOTAL MODELS AVAILABLE:'', len\(models\)\)
    print\(''''\)
    print\(''Generative models that support generateContent:''\)
    
    found_generative = False
    for model in models:
        if ''generateContent'' in model.supported_generation_methods:
            print\(f''  - {model.name}''\)
            found_generative = True
    
    if not found_generative:
        print\(''  \(No generative models found - API key may have restrictions\)''\)
        
except Exception as e:
    print\(f''Error: {str\(e\)[:300]}''\)
")
